fields.summary: TitaniumKit should have 0 Warnings on OS X

fields.description:
Related to PR #12 (https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/pull/12). Added new issue entry for this so that we can track this.

We may need a workaround for [WebKit Bug 135250|https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=135250]
Currently some unit tests are failing on Yosemite. Maybe on specific version of iOS 8 too.
fields.summary: Windows: Custom class issue due to WebKit Bug #135250

comments.body: Just found out that all unit tests for HAL and TitaniumKit passes on Yosemite after updating to latest HAL. I am not sure if it is because of latest changes on HAL or updates on Yosemite, but the original issue (some unit tests are failing on Yosemite) is fixed now. I think we can close this for now because this is not actually a issue for now.
Latest HAL + TitaniumKit + Yosemite fixes this issue. I think we can close this for now because original issue (some unit tests are failing on Yosemite) is fixed.
